SELECT p.id AS processId, p.name AS processName, p.type_code AS processTypeCode, dsc.name AS processTypeName, p.description, p.standard_time AS standardTime, p.has_machine AS hasMachine, TO_CHAR(p.created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS createdAt, p.created_by AS createdBy FROM process p LEFT JOIN detail_sys_code dsc ON dsc.detail_code = p.type_code AND dsc.main_code = 'PCS'
AND LOWER(p.name) LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{processName}) || '%'
AND p.has_machine = #{hasMachine}
ORDER BY p.id DESC
